div.p: Arquivo da Correspondência do Dr Júlio Henriques, Biblioteca do Departmento de Botânica, Universidade de Coimbra, Coimbra.

I was agreeably surprised, dear Prof. Henriques, when I learned from your letter of the 26 March
See J. Henriques to M, 26 March 1873 (in this edition as 73-03-26b). and the accompanying Diploma, that the "Instituto de Coimbra" had done me the high honor of electing me one of its corresponding members
M had been elected more than a year earlier. See Society of the Institute of Coimbra to M, 27 March 1872, and J. Henriques to M, 26 March 1873 (in this edition as 73-03-26b) in which Henriques apologises for not informing M sooner of his having been elected.
I beg to assure you and your learned confreres, that I value this honor very highly and that I will endeavour with such means as are at my command to be an active cooperator with them.

I shall be most happy to continue in communication with the Coimbra University and especially with its botanic Garden. Not being quite well, you must kindly excuse it, when I answer to your friendly communication so briefly on this occasion.
